description: A swimwear classic with a twist — our Palma Top refines a classic bralette shape with a decorative center knot. Made of the highest-quality Sensitive® Fabrics by Eurojersey (a world-renowned source from Italy), which feature four-way stretch, impeccable fit, long lifespan and SPF 50 sun protection.
Adjustable clasp closure at center back
title: PALMA TOP

description: Perfect the art of the subtle reveal in our Palma One-Piece. This refined suit has a knotted front with a flattering cut-out detail. Made of the highest-quality Sensitive® Fabrics by Eurojersey (a world-renowned source from Italy), which feature four-way stretch, impeccable fit, long lifespan and SPF 50 sun protection.
Medium back coverage (between minimal and full)
title: PALMA ONE-PIECE

description: Pattern play. Color-blocks, crisp borders and geometric prints join the graphic mix on our box-pleated Clarice Skirt — a nod to legendary designer David Hicks. This long, elegant style from the runway is made from fluid silk.
Partial poly georgette lining at back panel
title: CLARICE SKIRT

description: A swimwear classic with a twist — our Palma Hipster refines a classic brief with knotted detailing at the sides. Made of the highest-quality Sensitive® Fabrics by Eurojersey (a world-renowned source from Italy), which feature four-way stretch, impeccable fit, long lifespan and SPF 50 sun protection.
Sits low and straight across hips
Medium back coverage (between minimal and full)
title: PALMA HIPSTER

description: Texture meets luster on our Tatiana Sandal, done in printed satin topped with resin pearls. The embellishments dress up the classic thong shape, making it a comfortable choice for everything from pool days to summer parties.
title: TATIANA THONG SANDAL

description: Zipper with hook-and-eye closure at side seam
title: ARIA TWEED SKIRT

description: With a twist. A comfortable yet elegant option for round-the-clock wear, our Annabelle Bow Slide works plush suede into a knotted design. It slips on with ease, adding instant polish to any look.
title: ANNABELLE SUEDE BOW SLIDE

description: Our silk Brigitte Romper is printed with a geometric diamond motif inspired by Moroccan tapestry. This play on one of our design signatures can be worn as a cover-up or a tailored one-piece — easily transitioning from beach days to brunch.
title: BRIGITTE ROMPER

description: May be worn as a hip or waist belt. Please refer to belt size guide to determine your ideal fit.
title: 1" REVERSIBLE LOGO BELT

description: A fresh revival of one of our favorite silhouettes, the Nylon Belt Bag comes in an octagonal print developed by legendary designer David Hicks. Take a cue from our runway show by wearing it low on the hips or slung over one shoulder.
Holds a mini wallet, a phone and a card case
May be carried as a belt bag or shoulder bag
title: NYLON BELT BAG

description: A swimwear classic with a twist — our Palma Top refines a classic bralette shape with a decorative center knot. Made of the highest-quality Sensitive® Fabrics by Eurojersey (a world-renowned source from Italy), which feature four-way stretch, impeccable fit, long lifespan and SPF 50 sun protection.
Adjustable clasp closure at center back
title: PALMA TOP

description: A polished wrap silhouette, ideal for work or weekends, our Ruth Skirt is crafted from a stretch-cotton blend, comfortably lined in smooth voile fabric. Pair it with a tucked-in top to flaunt the gold toggle closures.
title: RUTH SKIRT

description: Our silk Brigitte Romper is printed with a geometric diamond motif inspired by Moroccan tapestry. This play on one of our design signatures can be worn as a cover-up or a tailored one-piece — easily transitioning from beach days to brunch.
title: BRIGITTE ROMPER

description: Beautiful texture and scalloped edges detail our Bailey Blazer, a crisp jacket crafted in tapestry-inspired jacquard. Contouring seams, flap pockets and tonal buttons give the fitted style a clean finish.
Button closure at center front; buttoned cuffs
title: BAILEY BLAZER

description: A little him, a little her. Crafted in a mid-weight wool blend, our Holt Coat features a classic windowpane check, giving it a fresh, modern feel. It’s finished with crisp lapels, lacquered buttons and patch pockets.
title: HOLT COAT

description: A swimwear classic with a twist — our Palma Hipster refines a classic brief with knotted detailing at the sides. Made of the highest-quality Sensitive® Fabrics by Eurojersey (a world-renowned source from Italy), which feature four-way stretch, impeccable fit, long lifespan and SPF 50 sun protection.
Sits low and straight across hips
Medium back coverage (between minimal and full)
title: PALMA HIPSTER

description: Suede placket with snap closures at center front
title: RORY SWEATER COAT

description: Our plaid Gwen Coat is great for between-season weather. Made in Italy from merino wool, it has a generous silhouette, with patch pockets, fringe trims and a draped overlay that can be styled as a scarf.
title: Gwen Coat

description: A new take on one of our most iconic styles. The Embellished Tory Tunic is dressed up for the season with embroidery inspired by traditional Romanian needlework and hand-beading on cotton poplin. Finished with a discreet on-seam zipper, it’s a classic staple of everyday and getaway dressing.
title: EMBELLISHED TORY TUNIC
